title: Ecommerce Product Page Creator
job_overview:
Role: Ecommerce Product Page Creator (Supplements & Health Niche)

 Type: Remote, Part-Time to Full-Time
 Rate: $4–5/hour to start, with performance-based increases.


We're looking for someone reliable, focused, and detail-oriented to help us build high-converting product pages for our growing supplement brand. The process is simple, and we provide templates and direction—but you’ll need to have a strong sense for visuals and marketing-driven copy.
What You’ll Do:
Build new product pages using our proven layout and structure
Create and edit product images using Canva, Photoshop, or AI tools
Write product descriptions that are clear, persuasive, and follow a specific marketing flow
Collaborate with the team to launch pages quickly and efficiently
Occasionally help with launching similar stores in other niches
What We’re Looking For:
Someone dependable and focused who can work independently
Experience with Canva or Photoshop (bonus if you’ve used AI tools for product images)
Basic understanding of what makes a product page convert (headlines, benefits, structure)
Good writing skills and an eye for clean layout
Able to follow instructions while spotting ways to improve and optimize
Why Join Us:
Room to grow in both hours and rate based on your output and performance
Flexible work schedule
Opportunity to be part of a fast-moving ecommerce project with a clear direction
